problem_names:
theorem eval_prim[simp]: assumes e1:"E e1 = E (ENat n1)" and e2:"E e2 = E (ENat n2)" 
  shows "E(EPrim f e1 e2)=E(ENat (f n1 n2))"
theorem eval_ifz[simp]: assumes e1: "E e1  = E(ENat 0)" shows "E(EIf e1 e2 e3) = E(e3)"

theorem eval_ifnz[simp]: assumes e1: "E(e1) = E(ENat n)" and nz: "n \<noteq> 0"
  shows "E(EIf e1 e2 e3) = E(e2)"

theorem eval_app_lam: assumes vv: "is_val v"
  shows "E(EApp (ELam x e) v) = E (subst x v e)"
translations:
theorem eval_prim[simp]: assumes e1:"E e1 = E (ENat n1)" and e2:"E e2 = E (ENat n2)" 
  shows "E(EPrim f e1 e2)=E(ENat (f n1 n2))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EPrim f e1 e2) = E (ENat (f n1 n2))
using e1 e2

proof (prove)
using this:
  E e1 = E (ENat n1)
  E e2 = E (ENat n2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EPrim f e1 e2) = E (ENat (f n1 n2))
by auto
theorem eval_ifz[simp]: assumes e1: "E e1  = E(ENat 0)" shows "E(EIf e1 e2 e3) = E(e3)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EIf e1 e2 e3) = E e3
using e1

proof (prove)
using this:
  E e1 = E (ENat 0)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EIf e1 e2 e3) = E e3
by auto

theorem eval_ifnz[simp]: assumes e1: "E(e1) = E(ENat n)" and nz: "n \<noteq> 0"
  shows "E(EIf e1 e2 e3) = E(e2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EIf e1 e2 e3) = E e2
using e1 nz

proof (prove)
using this:
  E e1 = E (ENat n)
  n \<noteq> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EIf e1 e2 e3) = E e2
by auto

theorem eval_app_lam: assumes vv: "is_val v"
  shows "E(EApp (ELam x e) v) = E (subst x v e)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. E (EApp (ELam x e) v) = E (subst x v e)
apply (rule ext)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa. E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa = E (subst x v e) xa
apply (rule equalityI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa. E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa \<subseteq> E (subst x v e) xa
 2. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (rule subsetI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa \<Longrightarrow>
       xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
 2. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (subgoal_tac "EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e")

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa \<Longrightarrow>
       EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e
 3. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
prefer 2

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa \<Longrightarrow>
       EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
 3. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (rule beta)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa \<Longrightarrow> is_val v
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
 3. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
using vv

proof (prove)
using this:
  is_val v

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa \<Longrightarrow> is_val v
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
 3. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
 2. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (rule subject_reduction)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (?e10 xa xaa) xa
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ?e10 xa xaa \<longrightarrow> subst x v e
 3. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e
 2. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa. E (subst x v e) xa \<subseteq> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (rule subsetI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa \<Longrightarrow>
       xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (subgoal_tac "EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa \<Longrightarrow>
       EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e
prefer 2

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa \<Longrightarrow>
       EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (rule beta)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa. xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa \<Longrightarrow> is_val v
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
using vv

proof (prove)
using this:
  is_val v

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa. xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa \<Longrightarrow> is_val v
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (EApp (ELam x e) v) xa
apply (rule reverse_step_pres_denot)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> ?e'18 xa xaa
 2. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (?e'18 xa xaa) xa
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa xaa.
       \<lbrakk>xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa;
        EApp (ELam x e) v \<longrightarrow> subst x v e\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xaa \<in> E (subst x v e) xa
apply assumption

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
